author: Hayley Minn
title: Geri Horner breaks down as she opens up about the fact pal George Michael never got to meet son Montague
text:
Geri Horner breaks down as she opens up about the fact pal George Michael never got to meet son Montague The Spice Girls star was very close to the late singing legend Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Geri Horner pays tribute to George Michael Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Geri Horner broke down on This Morning as she opened up about her late best friend George Michael. 
The Freedom singer tragically died on Christmas Day 2016. 
And the Spice Girls star - who was formerly known as Geri Halliwell - spoke to him before he passed away for her documentary Geri's Nineties: The Decade That Made Me. 
A tearful Geri spoke about the fact her dear friend never got to meet her son Montague George Hector Horner - who was born on 21st January.
